name: MERGE CITY - MOTOR EMPIRE
description:
Merge City is the hottest thing on the STREETS. Come play the best, most addictive, idle game for smartphones!

- Take your car on a STREET RACE through Merge City
- Build an IDLE CITY EMPIRE and earn money through city racing
- Unlock all the cars to become a trillionaire supercar TYCOON
- Tons of stock cars to discover
- Electrifying 3d graphics and effects


"I'm way too addicted to this game" - scoplecopter028
"I love racing my cars in 3D!" - AlDenteCapri173


Features of Merge City: Motor Empire

• Merge your cars to form SUPERCARS. Race them on the track to earn $$$ Billions of Dollars $$$.
• Massive fleet of cars. You will stay busy trying to unlock them all.
• Earn money while completely idle. Your racers earn you billions while you're away!
• Build your business and upgrade your garage.

Become the $$$ Trillionaire $$$ supercar tycoon TODAY!

Want to see more cars? Have a suggestion? We'd love to hear it!
Send us an email at contact@stencil.ltd
